mapper.select: SELECT a.*, sender.name AS senderName, sender.file_path AS senderFilePath, p.name AS projectName FROM Alarm a -- 보낸 사람 정보 (시스템 알림일 수 있으니 LEFT JOIN) LEFT JOIN User sender ON a.sender_id = sender.user_id -- 프로젝트 정보 (프로젝트 관련 없을 수 있으니 LEFT JOIN) LEFT JOIN Project p ON a.project_id = p.project_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE Alarm SET is_read = TRUE WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Alarm WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE Alarm SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = TRUE AND deleted_at IS NULL
